item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Olives on N. Main St. across from Mills Tavern

Okay, so its been suggested a few times and this week we're going to Olives!!!! Although some of us were here a lot in '09 for Salsa on Tuesday night, we haven't had an official Monday Night here and its time. Olives has a huge open bar space and a large dining area, although usually most of the tables are whisked away so the space can be opened up for the dance floor. In fact, I have never seen all the tables in it, so I wonder if its really true.........They are also known for their inventive Martini List, but have a decent beer selection as well. Anyway, even though we're going on a Monday night, (I understand it gets a little wild on the weekends), if you haven't been yet, or you have, come on down, hang out and let's check it out!

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver scarf, but we're hard to miss!
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Olives!
